00007 #include "wiring.h" // we need this for the serial port defines
00008 #include "ax12.h"
00009 #include <avr/interrupt.h>
00010 
00011 /******************************************************************************
00012  * Hardware Serial Level, this uses the same stuff as Serial, therefore 
00013  *  you should not use the Arduino Serial library.
00014  ******************************************************************************/
00015 
00016 byte ax_rx_buffer[AX12_BUFFER_SIZE];    //buffer de recepción
00017 int status_id;
00018 int status_error;
00019 int status_data;
00020 
00021 // making these volatile keeps the compiler from optimizing loops of available()
00022 volatile byte ax_rx_Pointer;
00023 
00025 void setTX(){
00026     bitClear(UCSR1B, RXCIE1);    // deshabilita la interrupción de recepción 
00027     bitClear(UCSR1B, RXEN1);     // deshabilila la recepción
00028     bitSet(UCSR1B, TXEN1);       // habilita la trasmisión
00029 }
00030 void setRX(){
00031     bitClear(UCSR1B, TXEN1);
00032     bitSet(UCSR1B, RXEN1);
00033     bitSet(UCSR1B, RXCIE1); 
00034     ax_rx_Pointer = 0;         // resetea el puntero del buffer
00035 }
00036 
00038 byte ax12writeB(byte data){
00039     while (bit_is_clear(UCSR1A, UDRE1));    // espera que el micro estÈ pronto para trasmitir
00040     UDR1 = data;                            // escribe el byte a trasmitir
00041     return data; 
00042 }
00043 
00046 ISR(USART1_RX_vect){  
00047     ax_rx_buffer[(ax_rx_Pointer++)] = UDR1;    // esta es la rutina de interrupción de recepción
00048 }                                              // lo que hace es meter el byte recibido en el buffer
00049 
00051 void ax12Init(long baud){
00052     UBRR1H = ((F_CPU / 16 + baud / 2) / baud - 1) >> 8;
00053     UBRR1L = ((F_CPU / 16 + baud / 2) / baud - 1);        // setea la velocidad del USART
00054     ax_rx_Pointer = 0;                                    
00055     // enable rx
00056     setRX();
00057 }
00058 
00059 /******************************************************************************
00060  * Packet Level
00061  ******************************************************************************/
00062 
00064 void ax12SendPacket (byte id, byte datalength, byte instruction, byte *data){
00065     byte checksum = 0;
00066     setTX();    
00067     ax12writeB(0xFF);
00068     ax12writeB(0xFF);
00069     checksum += ax12writeB(id);
00070     checksum += ax12writeB(datalength + 2);
00071     checksum += ax12writeB(instruction);
00072     for (byte f=0; f<datalength; f++) {     // data = parámetros
00073       checksum += ax12writeB(data[f]);
00074     }
00075     // checksum = 
00076     ax12writeB(~checksum);
00077     setRX();
00078 }
